svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - January 27 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 27, 2024" date: "2024-01-26"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
‚Ä¢ Final public testnets upgrade to Dencun Jan 30 (Sepolia) & Feb 7 (Hole≈°ky) Lightweight beaconcha.in
explorers: mainnet , Hole≈°ky & Sepolia
Final public testnets upgrade to Dencun Jan 30 (Sepolia) & Feb 7 (Hole≈°ky)
‚Ä¢ Lightweight beaconcha.in explorers: mainnet , Hole≈°ky & Sepolia
‚Ä¢ L2s testing blobs: RollCall (L2 standards) EIP4844 readiness call : L2s testing on Goerli or waiting
for Sepolia & improving communications with core devs OP & Base devnets posting batches via blobs on
Goerli testnet Starknet sent state diff blob on Goerli testnet
L2s testing blobs:
‚Ä¢ RollCall (L2 standards) EIP4844 readiness call : L2s testing on Goerli or waiting for Sepolia &
improving communications with core devs

‚Ä¢ OP & Base devnets posting batches via blobs on Goerli testnet
OP & Base devnets posting batches via blobs on Goerli testnet
‚Ä¢ Starknet sent state diff blob on Goerli testnet
Starknet sent state diff blob on Goerli testnet
‚Ä¢ Dencun interop testing call video : high memory usage after blob spamming, max churn limit (EIP7514)
will be tested on Goerli and first blobs expire on Goerli Feb 5
Dencun interop testing call video : high memory usage after blob spamming, max churn limit (EIP7514)
‚Ä¢ EF DevOps Attacknet : chaos testing tooling, plan to open source after Dencun
EF DevOps Attacknet : chaos testing tooling, plan to open source after Dencun
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Electra upgrade
scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Client team priorities : Lighthouse , Lodestar &
Prysm Electra EIPs : EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain), EIP7002 (EL triggerable exits) & EIP7549
(move committee index outside attestation) Not in Electra : EIP6914 (reuse validator indices)
Discussions ongoing : EIP7251 (increase max effective balance), EIP7547 (inclusion lists), EIP7594
(PeerDAS) & SSZification EIPs
‚Ä¢ Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Client team priorities :
Lighthouse , Lodestar & Prysm Electra EIPs : EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain), EIP7002 (EL
triggerable exits) & EIP7549 (move committee index outside attestation) Not in Electra : EIP6914
(reuse validator indices) Discussions ongoing : EIP7251 (increase max effective balance), EIP7547
(inclusion lists), EIP7594 (PeerDAS) & SSZification EIPs
‚Ä¢ Client team priorities : Lighthouse , Lodestar & Prysm
Client team priorities : Lighthouse , Lodestar & Prysm

committee index outside attestation)

‚Ä¢ Not in Electra : EIP6914 (reuse validator indices)
Not in Electra : EIP6914 (reuse validator indices)

Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 78% supermajority, could cause a
chain split & lose your staked ETH Allnodes & P2P migrated to Besu Lido & Kiln reducing Geth usage
Coinbase & Kraken ‚Äútaking a look‚Äù at client diversity Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over
33.3% could mean loss of finality

‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth 78% supermajority, could cause a chain split & lose your staked ETH Allnodes &
P2P migrated to Besu Lido & Kiln reducing Geth usage Coinbase & Kraken ‚Äútaking a look‚Äù at client
diversity

Data viz on whether we can increase the gas limit

stakers to consolidate without having to fully exit validators & redeploy
Validator in-protocol consolidation in EIP7251 (increase max effective balance), to allow large
Research
‚Ä¢ Potential changes to staking rewards & penalties to reduce issuance moderately at high staking
levels
For stakers
‚Ä¢ Rated list of solo stakers in CSV format (first 500k indices)
Support the Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev legal defense fund
The Biden administration is attempting to criminalize open source software development as part of its
war on crypto.

supervision ERC7603 : Context-dependent multi-asset tokens (ERC1155 extension)

Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Solidity v0.8.24 : Cancun support (via EVM version flag): tstore & tload transient storage
(EIP1153), blobhash & blobbasefee (EIP4844) and mcopy (EIP5656) Apple silicon support

‚Ä¢ Cancun support (via EVM version flag): tstore & tload transient storage (EIP1153), blobhash &
blobbasefee (EIP4844) and mcopy (EIP5656)

deployment scripts/tests
